Class NGLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • angularBeans.log.NGLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @NGSessionScoped
public class NGLogger
extends Object
implements Serializable
    when injected into an @AngularBean, NGLogger will log messages directly on the browser console.
